product_name: NiteRider Lightning Bug 120 USB Front Bike Light - 2014 Overstock
long_description: An ideal choice for practical commuters, the lightweight, compact Lightning Bug 120 outputs 120 lumens to illuminate the road ahead and help you be seen by oncoming traffic.
short_description: An ideal choice for practical commuters, the lightweight, compact Lightning Bug 120 outputs 120 lumens to illuminate the road ahead and help you be seen by oncoming traffic.
